channel.title: Business on Dmitry's Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Business on Dmitry's Notes

item.title: My Projects
item.description: I can say that I’m a serial maker and entrepreneur by spirit. From my early days on the Internet I try to create various online projects and convert them into stable businesses. When I do work for someone else (freelance, contractor jobs) I can’t say that every time I do the most interesting things out there, and this is where my ventures help me to keep going: I can learn whatever technology I want, I can do whatever I want in a way I want :) So it benefits a lot. Here is an incomplete (I hope) list of my projects. If a project generated revenue I put a $ sign corresponding to each digit in the total revenue for the project. ✝ - means project is discontinued.
